org.lsmr.vending.hardware

Interface DisplayListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractHardwareListener

    public interface DisplayListener
extends AbstractHardwareListener
    Listens for events emanating from a display device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageChange(Display display, java.lang.String oldMessage, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Event that announces that the message on the indicated display has changed.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.lsmr.vending.hardware.AbstractHardwareListener

        disabled, enabled

    • Method Detail

      • messageChange

        void messageChange(Display display,
                   java.lang.String oldMessage,
                   java.lang.String newMessage)
        Event that announces that the message on the indicated display has changed.
        Parameters:
        display - The device on which the event occurred.
        oldMessage - The previous message on display.
        newMessage - The new message on display.
